name: Lemon Mishap [Bolivia]
description:
Welcome to "Lemon Mishap"!  In this game inspired by the original Lemonade Tycoon, you'll be managing your very own lemonade stand business. You'll need to buy ingredients like lemons, sugar, ice, and cups. Keep an eye on your supplies and make sure you're always stocked up! You'll also need to price your lemonade correctly in order to make a profit. Choose your own recipe, cut the lemons and mix the ingredients to find the tastier lemonade. Can you make the most profit and build a lemonade empire?

Lets begin!

Start the day stocking up on supplies at the store. When you have everything you need, open up your stand and start selling! Customers will approach your stand. Be careful though, if you price your lemonade too high no one will buy it!

Don't forget you'll need to mix up a new batch of lemonade. Start by cutting the lemons into slices, then add sugar and ice to taste. Mix everything together and serve it up!

Keep an eye on your supplies and make sure you're always stocked up! If you run out of lemons or sugar, customers will start to get angry. 

That's all there is to it! With a little bit of luck,  you'll make a lemonade empire!

Theme: Play to learn
